name: COMP2007
description:
Description:

COMP2007 is a 3rd person shooter where you must survive waves of enemies.

Control Scheme - 

W/A/S/D | Left Analog Stick : Movement

Left Click | Right Trigger: Shoot

R | East Button: Reload

ESC | Start: Pause

Instructions For Installation:

Extract .rar file and run the .exe

A YouTube Gameplay video linked on the page: 

A Youtube Gameplay video

ALL SOUNDFX CREDITS GO TO:

Sound effects and music obtained from zapsplat.com
